statements: SELECT * FROM guest_list WHERE guest_id = 1;

SELECT guest_name, event_id FROM guest_list WHERE rsvp_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY guest_name ASC;

SELECT * FROM guest_list WHERE rsvp_status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT guest_name FROM guest_list WHERE event_id = 3 ORDER BY guest_name ASC;

SELECT * FROM event_guests WHERE attending = TRUE;
SELECT name, email FROM event_guests WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM event_guests WHERE attending = FALSE;
SELECT name, email FROM event_guests WHERE id IN (1, 4);
SELECT id, name, email, attending FROM event_guests;
SELECT name, email FROM event_guests WHERE attending = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM event_guests WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT name, rsvp_status FROM event_guests JOIN event_rsvps ON event_guests.id = event_rsvps.guest_id;
SELECT id, name, email FROM event_guests ORDER BY name ASC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_rsvps WHERE rsvp_status = 'RSVPED' ORDER BY guest_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Guests;
SELECT guest_name, email FROM Guests;
SELECT event_id, event_name, location FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT guest_name, event_name, rsvp_status FROM Guests JOIN RSVPs ON Guests.guest_id = RSVPs.guest_id;
SELECT g.guest_name, e.event_name, r.rsvp_status FROM Guests g JOIN RSVPs r ON g.guest_id = r.guest_id JOIN Events e ON r.event_id = e.event_id WHERE r.rsvp_status = 'Attending';

SELECT guest_name, email FROM Guests WHERE guest_id = 2;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM Events WHERE event_id = 3;
SELECT guest_name, event_name, rsvp_status FROM Guests JOIN RSVPs ON Guests.guest_id = RSVPs.guest_id WHERE rsvp_status = 'Attending';
SELECT event_name, location, guest_name FROM RSVPs JOIN Guests ON RSVPs.guest_id = Guests.guest_id JOIN Events ON RSVPs.event_id = Events.event_id WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM guest_lists;
SELECT guest_name, event_date FROM guest_lists ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT guest_name, rsvp_status FROM guest_lists INNER JOIN rsvps ON guest_lists.guest_id = rsvps.guest_id;
SELECT organizer_name, event_name FROM organizers JOIN events ON organizers.event_id = events.event_id;

SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT guest_name, organizer_name FROM guest_lists JOIN organizers ON guest_lists.event_id = organizers.event_id;

SELECT * FROM RSVP WHERE rsvp_status = 'Attending' ORDER BY rsvp_time DESC
